TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content: Can mods find people's people's IP address?

> 
> Can mods find people's people's IP address?

Yes, we can.
How and why?
The forum software has tools that can show the IP from which a post initiated, and a list of IPs used by a user. It's used to help identify spambots and duplicate accounts.
Has anyone ever made a second account by accident (they forgot they already had one)

> 
> How and why?

![qOmyY08.png](http://i.imgur.com/qOmyY08.png)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/qOmyY08.png](http://i.imgur.com/qOmyY08.png)

Is the two card icon (between the rep star and report post icons) how you give infractions? It looks like a red/yellow card used in soccer. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Is the two card icon (between the rep star and report post icons) how you give infractions? It looks like a red/yellow card used in soccer. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It is. Unsurprisingly, red is for an infraction, and yellow is for a warn. 

![6Ql0RCV.png](http://i.imgur.com/6Ql0RCV.png) (Infraction).

![oIprIY0.png](http://i.imgur.com/oIprIY0.png) (Warning). The little trash bin does funny things, I don't know what exactly. Edit : Manages deletion, apparently. Interesting.

> 
> It is. Unsurprisingly, red is for an infraction, and yellow is for a warn. 
> [http://i.imgur.com/6Ql0RCV.png](http://i.imgur.com/6Ql0RCV.png) (Infraction).
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/oIprIY0.png](http://i.imgur.com/oIprIY0.png) (Warning). The little trash bin does funny things, I don't know what exactly. Edit : Manages deletion, apparently. Interesting.

What other strange new worlds buttons are on the right of that bar below the post? That is, the ones not visible in that screenshot.

> 
> What other strange new worlds buttons are on the right of that bar below the post? That is, the ones not visible in that screenshot.

"Promote to Article"...

> 
> "Promote to Article"...

That's on the left, but I've never seen a screenshot of the right side, I don't think.

![MPLrysA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MPLrysA.jpg)

This is how your post looks to a moderator ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> Has anyone ever made a second account by accident (they forgot they already had one)

?????

> 
> Has anyone ever made a second account by accident (they forgot they already had one)

Yes, and we have a "merge accounts" thing the admins can use to combine them when it happens. Pretty rare though.

> 
> Yes, and we have a "merge accounts" thing the admins can use to combine them when it happens. Pretty rare though.

It's quite rare, and that's a good thing. Because it takes a very long time for the forums to rebuild all post archives and such.
Do you have any stories on how you discovered KSP?
What's your favorite mod in Ksp?

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/MPLrysA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MPLrysA.jpg)
> This is how your post looks to a moderator ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Thanks!

> 
> Do you have any stories on how you discovered KSP?

My significant other saw a news article and shared it with me...several hundred (thousand?) hours of KSP ago...a decision that I'm sure is full of regret....

> 
> What's your favorite mod in Ksp?

Why, I am my own favorite moderator...of course. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Silly Claw! He meant favorite *modification*, not *moderator*. That's because he said *what's*, not *who's*. 

On that note, *who* is your favorite moderator?

> 
> Silly Claw! He meant favorite *modification*, not *moderator*. That's because he said *what's*, not *who's*. 
> On that note, *who* is your favorite moderator?

Can't answer that, lest someone read it and be offended.

> 
> Do you have any stories on how you discovered KSP?

I was browsing another game's forums, and stumbled upon a thread about KSP. It seemed interesting and I decided to give it a go. Things eventually spun out of control and I'm still here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Favorite mod? I've often said AntennaRange (which is true), and I think the top 3 is completed by the Navball Docking Alignment Indicator and the Renaissance Compilation.
What does a light blue name denote? Such as [this person.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/146214-OakTree42)

> 
> What does a light blue name denote? Such as [this person.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/146214-OakTree42)

A person who streams on KSPTV ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Is there a place where we can make a thread advertising an animation series that is in the planning that is not ksp related? A friend of mine is interested in working with me to do so
